title: I got 80k IP and still have nothing to spend it on
body:
Seriously i mean its literally just collecting dust now. Sure i purchase a champion every now and then but usually i hit about 98k IP before i ever need to worry about that. Sure i can buy a summoner name change but i happen to like my name now so then that leaves me with no options since i have all the rune pages and masteries i could want.

What about us Riot the players who own all the champions currently out and just have IP piling up to do nothing?
